name: MovieHunt
0:
”Alexa open Movie Hunt”
”start the game”
”start a dialogue”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie hunt
des:
Welcome to Movie Hunt, a game where you hunt for Hollywood movie names from famous movie dialogues. Movie Hunt will play you a Hollywood movie dialogue and you have to find out from which movie it is from.

You can start the skill by saying "Alexa, Start Movie Hunt" or "Alexa, open MovieHunt'

You can give you answer like "The movie is Gladiator" or "The answer is Gladiator" or just "Gladiator"

We’re always working to improve the Skill. If you’ve got some feedback, please let us know via email at kiran@cedextech.com

Made with Love in India! botartisanz.com

Enjoy the game.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
